messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Eberyone has big buttholes on this station, sho

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: Please congratulate the research director on being a loser and demoting himself to bartender

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Mining team make us that money so we can buy cool shit for eberyone k thx

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chapel Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, not more than 15 energy draining parasites have swarmed into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Big Butthole Metropolis's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
